title: # 394 - Dr. Drew & ME
description:
My brand new stand up comedy special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

Today I sit down with Dr. Drew. We talk about anxiety, OCD, what shows we are watching, tips on how to stay safe, how to manage anxiety, and much more!

Check out Dr. Drews podcast’s “Dr. Drew After Dark” and “The Dr. Drew Podcast” wherever you get yours!

This episode is brought to you by Fiverr. Take Five and check out www.FIVERR.com and get 10% off your first order by using my code BERTCAST at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Cigar.com. Get 15% off on any order of $99 or more plus free shipping. Go to www.cigar.com and use the promo code “BERTCAST” at checkout. 

This episode is also brought to you by Caliper CBD. Get 20% off your first order at www.trycaliper.com/bert when you use the promo code “Bert” at checkout

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer
